docs.text: robert benton has assembled a stellar , mature cast for his latest feature , twilight , a film noir mystery set amid the fading stars of hollywood .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: paul newman stars as retired detective harry ross .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: harry has spent the last couple of years doing odd jobs for jack and catherine ames ( gene hackman and susan sarandon ) , a pair of married actors who have fallen from the limelight .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: when jack sends him on a routine delivery job , however , the old instincts kick in .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: soon , harry is wading through a mystery where friendships and lives are on the line , and he no longer knows who to trust .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there are plenty of familiar faces throughout twilight , in addition to newman , hackman and sarandon .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: james garner plays raymond hope , a former cop and one of harry's best friends .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: stockard channing plays verna , harry's former partner , and possibly a former love interest .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: reese witherspoon is mel , the distrustful daughter of the ames' , and liev schrieber is her scuzzy boyfriend .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: giancarlo esposito appears as harry's bumbling detective protigi , and john spencer is a suspicious police captain .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: with a cast like that , it's almost worth watching twilight just to stargaze .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: luckily , there's more to the film than some sort of actor's recognition ceremony .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: twilight has a solid film noir-ish plot .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it may not have as many twists and turns as some of the classics , but it has much more than a lot of what passes for film these days .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the major cast members all deliver strong performances , as can be expected of their caliber .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: however , none of them have that little extra oomph which would make them memorable .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the supporting cast is enjoyable , if a little underdrawn .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: stockard channing's character , in particular , is a cipher .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there's more to her character than the film takes the time to describe .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's a minor , but irritating , flaw .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: with a solid cast , and a good plot , there's a lot to recommend about twilight .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's biggest flaw is actually its short running time .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: at a slim 94 minutes , there's a lot of stuff that's packed into an awfully small package .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: still , the chance to see newman , sarandon and hackman working together is worth a cramp or two .
docs.label: positive
